name: Barrel Bash
description:
Barrel Bash is my submission to the GBJAM.

The lil armadillo guy likes to get shoot from barrel to barrel!
Join the fun and reach the highscore!

CONTROLS:

Shoot: SPACE
Move: Left & Right

You can fill a combo bar to earn more points. But the higher your score gets, the quicker will the barrels move.

This is my first submission for the GBJAM. I wanted to start with something more simple. When it comes to gamejams, I usually run out of time. so I wanted to be sure I can submit something that is really playable. The game is inspired by the barrel mechanics of the old Donkey Kong Country games.

Hope you have fun and enjoy my game :)
